body:
*sigh* Will there be any extraction of this feature into a gem so that
those that have and do use it can still get on with things?

Yanking it without providing some sort of alternative or documentation on
the correct way of handling STI with a single controller & views seems
about as insensitive as the original change that this ticket was created to
oppose.

Sorry to be so negative but it seems like you're just wanting to remove it
because "I never used that feature" and because it has some flawed use
cases. Why not just fix the broken behaviour?



On Thu, Aug 2, 2012 at 9:03 AM, Wojciech Wnętrzak <
reply@reply.github.com
